title: Ep. 343 - All Politics is About Religion
description:
Freshmen congresswomen Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez, Rashida Tlaib, and Ilhan Omar prove the age-old maxim: at bottom, all political problems are theological problems. We will examine the politics of religion and the religion of politics from Palestinian rockets to Pennsylvania mosques to gospel hymns for the Green New Deal. Date: 5-06-2019
